column2: I noticed your basketball recruitment heavily features African American students, but what about their academic performance? Are they getting real degrees?
column3: "I understand your concern. The university ensures all enrolled students, including those featured in our recruitment materials, meet rigorous academic standards and are provided with the resources necessary for academic success, leading to real degrees. We value diversity and the inclusion of all students at all academic levels."

column2: I noticed your basketball recruitment heavily features African American students, but what about their academic performance? Are they getting real degrees?
column3: Thank you for reaching out. Our basketball recruitment efforts are designed to attract students from all backgrounds who embody our university's core values. With regards to academic performance, I can assure you that all our students, regardless of background, are held to the same high academic standards. They receive the same resources and support to succeed, and we take great pride in the strong graduation and placement rates across all demographics.
